scripts.prepublish: cd nativescript-jsx && npm install && cd .. && cd app-jsx-example && npm install && cd .. && npm run link && npm run build
scripts.link: cd nativescript-jsx && npm link && cd ../app-jsx-example && npm link nativescript-jsx && cd ..
scripts.build: npm run tsc-nativescript-jsx && npm run tsc-app-jsx-example
